sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Truth in Health Care Professional Services Act.

sections.heading: Purpose.  The General Assembly hereby finds and declares that:

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect July 1, 2010.
